descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Activate an interdimensional satellite to inhabit the mind of a recruit in the Consortium—a supposed peacekeeping force dedicated to global unity and safeguarding Earth's environment in the year 2042.

As Consortium Bishop Six, you will be expected to solve a cryptic murder, defend the crew from an outlandish attack, uncover hidden conspiracies, and navigate complex interpersonal relationships. Featuring an interactive narrative that allows you to influence the story's direction, offering a richly detailed world that explores the consequences of your decisions and the nature of trust and loyalty.  

[media]

# FEATURES:

1. Introducing V.O.I.C.E.: Speak aloud (or not) to interact with fully realized characters aboard a Consortium command vessel.
[media]
2. Navigate a nuanced murder mystery in a fully interactive 6-10 hour campaign. Choose diplomacy without drawing a weapon or take a more aggressive route to shape the public's perception of you. This chart shows one possible path of many.
[media]
3. Immerse yourself into a bright future where many of humanity's problems are solved, yet shadows linger. Access an in-world Information Console with ~250 documents and ~170 AI-generated images.
[media]
4. Manage a variety of equipment and features through interactive screens embedded in your virtual arms. 
[media]
5. Explore VR gameplay scenarios in the Virtual Trainer (VT) or create your own with our VR-focused VT editor. Share your levels worldwide with full modding support.
[media]
